name: Molly Thompson
background: Molly Thompson serves as Head of Documentaries and Unscripted at Apple TV+ UK. Focus areas: Feature documentaries, factual series.
thematic_priorities: Premium, inspiring stories with positive outcomes
technical_requirements: Accessibility: Subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
Graphics & Branding: Adherence to broadcaster branding guidelines
Language & Subtitles: English; multilingual where applicable
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: Must come via established production company or agent
Detailed treatment with premise, format and episode breakdown
Submit via Apple's established production partners
additional_info: Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen; Encouragement of sustainable production practices; Support for projects across the UK (where applicable).
